body.p:
It gives me great pleasure to inform you that the portrait & painting of you a few years ago has been purchased by one of your admirers and presented to the Met. Museum of Art of New York—where I hope it will be seen by many thousands of people and for many years to come. I am delighted to have been the means of giving to future generations a portrait of you that is certainly one of my best works. I may tell
you also that it has been engraved and is to be published in Harpers Magazine.
Hoping you are in good health and with best of good wishes.
